about_the_game:
Embark on a breathtaking odyssey with The Story of Pixels: Monster Pack!

Brace yourself for an awe-inspiring journey into the depths of your imagination as this extraordinary collection breathes life into your game, enchanting players with spine-tingling encounters and exhilarating gameplay. Within this mystical pack, a diverse array of menacing creatures eagerly awaits, ready to set your world ablaze with wonder and terror, ensuring your players an unforgettable gaming experience!

This pack Includes:

* Each character has a Face Icon (8 Faces included)
* 1 Animated Yeti
* 1 Animated Lizard-Snake hybrid
* 1 Animated Zombie
* 1 Animated Spooky Scary Skeleton
* 1 Animated Orc
* 1 Animated Vampire
* 1 Animated Wolf
* 1 Animated Vulcano Monster
* 8 Full-body Graphics for Every Monster

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
